text.0: we have beheld her earliest lights approaching her many glories part on high asunder.
text.1: on car sublime refulgent wending hither o uṣas bring the wealth that makes us happy.
text.2: the fire wellkindied sings aloud to greet her and with their hymns the priests are chaming welcome.
text.3: uṣas approaches in her splendour driving all evil darkness far away the goddess.
text.4: apparent eastward are those lights of morning sending out lustre as they rise around them.
text.5: she hath brought forth sun sacrifice and agni and far away hath fled detested darkness.
text.6: rich daughter of the sky we all behold her yea all men look on dawn as she is breaking.
text.7: fler car that moves selfharnessed hath she mounted the car drawn onward by her wellyoked horses.
text.8: inspired with loving thoughts this day to greet thee we and our wealthy nobles have awakened.
text.9: show yourselves fruitful dawns as ye are rising preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
